column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aang says : " I ca n't pin her down !
#Text=Aang !
#Text=Toph !
#Text=Stop attacking !
#Text=Do n't you see what she 's doing ?
#Text=She 's just playing with us .
#Text=She 's not even trying to win this fight !
#Text=" Azula says : " Not true .
#Text=I 'm giving it my all .
#Text=" Toph says : " You 're trying to keep us here and waste all our time !
#Text=" Azula says : " Um , right , I think your friend just said that , genius .
#Text=And since you ca n't see , I should tell you I 'm rolling my eyes .
#Text=" Toph says : " I 'll roll your whole head !
#Text=" Sokka says : " She 's just baiting you again .
#Text=" Aang says : " Okay , so what do we do , just ignore her ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " We do n't have a choice .
#Text=We just have to get out of here and find the Fire Lord on our own somehow .
#Text=" Azula says : " It 's a trap .
#Text=Do n't say I did n't warn you .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Ignore !
#Text=" Azula says : " So , Sokka 's your name , right ?
#Text=My favorite prisoner used to mention you all the time .
#Text=She was convinced you were going to come rescue her .
#Text=Of course you never came , and she gave up on you .
#Text=" Azula says : " Come and get it .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Where .
#Text=Is .
#Text=Suki ?!
#Text="
